Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Classique
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A nimble, modern marvel harkening back to the Renault F17 tank's iconic design. Melding vintage aesthetics with cutting-edge tech, this compact armored unit boasts agility and formidable firepower. Very vulnerable to flanking attacks.

Consumes less fuel than a Roadkill, but lacks explosive projectiles.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
<color=#bb8f04>Ammo type:</color> Steel.
